languages.text: "Скоро твой дух сможет проследовать за мной. Я повелю слугам перенести твое тело в покои, где никто не потревожит тебя. Жди в тишине и безопасности, а для меня охота началась".

traits.locale_text: "Скоро твой дух сможет проследовать за мной. Я повелю слугам перенести твое тело в покои, где никто не потревожит тебя. Жди в тишине и безопасности, а для меня охота началась".

languages.text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. I will bid the servants to carry your body to your chambers, where you will not be disturbed. Wait in silence and safety. For me, the hunt has begun."
languages.original_text: "Скоро твой дух сможет проследовать за мной. Я повелю слугам перенести твое тело в покои, где никто не потревожит тебя. Жди в тишине и безопасности, а для меня охота началась".

traits.locale_text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. I will bid the servants to carry your body to your chambers, where you will not be disturbed. Wait in silence and safety. For me, the hunt has begun."
"Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. I will bid the servants to carry your body to your chambers, where you will not be disturbed. Wait in silence and safety. For me, the hunt has begun."
"Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. I will bid the servants to carry your body to your chambers, where you will not be disturbed. Wait in silence and safety. For me, the hunt has begun."
"Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. I will bid the servants to carry your body to your chambers, where you will not be disturbed. Wait in silence and safety. For me, the hunt has begun."
"Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. I will bid the servants to carry your body to your chambers, where you will not be disturbed. Wait in silence and safety. For me, the hunt has begun."
"Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. I will bid the servants to carry your body to your chambers, where you will not be disturbed. Wait in silence and safety. For me, the hunt has begun."

languages.text: «Pronto su espíritu estará en condiciones de seguirme. Ordenaré a los sirvientes que lleven su cuerpo a sus aposentos, donde nadie le molestará. Espere a salvo y en silencio. Para mí, la cacería acaba de comenzar».
languages.original_text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. I will bid the servants to carry your body to your chambers, where you will not be disturbed. Wait in silence and safety. For me, the hunt has begun."

traits.locale_text: «Pronto su espíritu estará en condiciones de seguirme. Ordenaré a los sirvientes que lleven su cuerpo a sus aposentos, donde nadie le molestará. Espere a salvo y en silencio. Para mí, la cacería acaba de comenzar».

languages.text: 「まもなく、あなたの魂は私に従うようになるでしょう。私は下僕たちに、邪魔されないようにあなたの遺体をあなたの部屋に運ぶよう命じます。静かに、安全に待っていてください。私にとっての狩りは始まったのだ」
languages.original_text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. I will bid the servants to carry your body to your chambers, where you will not be disturbed. Wait in silence and safety. For me, the hunt has begun."

traits.locale_text: 「まもなく、あなたの魂は私に従うようになるでしょう。私は下僕たちに、邪魔されないようにあなたの遺体をあなたの部屋に運ぶよう命じます。静かに、安全に待っていてください。私にとっての狩りは始まったのだ」

languages.text: “用不了多久，你的精神就会与我同在。我会让仆人把你的肉体抬到你的房间里，这样就不会有人打扰你了。在安全之处耐心等待吧，对我而言，狩猎已经开始了。”
languages.original_text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. I will bid the servants to carry your body to your chambers, where you will not be disturbed. Wait in silence and safety. For me, the hunt has begun."

traits.locale_text: “用不了多久，你的精神就会与我同在。我会让仆人把你的肉体抬到你的房间里，这样就不会有人打扰你了。在安全之处耐心等待吧，对我而言，狩猎已经开始了。”

languages.text: "Bald wird Euer Geist bereit sein, mir zu folgen. Ich werde die Diener anweisen, Euren Körper in Eure Gemächer zu bringen, damit Ihr nicht gestört werdet. Wartet in Stille und Sicherheit. Für mich hat die Jagd begonnen."
languages.original_text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. I will bid the servants to carry your body to your chambers, where you will not be disturbed. Wait in silence and safety. For me, the hunt has begun."

traits.locale_text: "Bald wird Euer Geist bereit sein, mir zu folgen. Ich werde die Diener anweisen, Euren Körper in Eure Gemächer zu bringen, damit Ihr nicht gestört werdet. Wartet in Stille und Sicherheit. Für mich hat die Jagd begonnen."

languages.text: « Bientôt, votre esprit sera capable de me suivre. Je vais ordonner aux serviteurs de ramener votre corps dans vos quartiers, afin que l'on ne vous dérange pas. Attendez-y en silence. Pour moi, la chasse a commencé. »
languages.original_text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. I will bid the servants to carry your body to your chambers, where you will not be disturbed. Wait in silence and safety. For me, the hunt has begun."

traits.locale_text: « Bientôt, votre esprit sera capable de me suivre. Je vais ordonner aux serviteurs de ramener votre corps dans vos quartiers, afin que l'on ne vous dérange pas. Attendez-y en silence. Pour moi, la chasse a commencé. »

languages.text: "Yakında ruhun beni takip edebilecek. Hizmetkârlara bedenini odana taşımalarını emrettim. Orada seni kimse rahatsız etmez. Sükûnet ve emniyet içinde bekle. Benim için av başladı."
languages.original_text: "Soon your spirit will be able to follow me. I will bid the servants to carry your body to your chambers, where you will not be disturbed. Wait in silence and safety. For me, the hunt has begun."
